price: ߊ߲ ߡߊ߫ ߘߎ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߛߌߟߊߛߊ߬ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߸ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߰ ߕߘߍ߬ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߦߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
